scope: **Batch Automated Execution**: verification of the new logic to group all automated tests into a single agent invocation.

environmentData: **Test Data**: A mock `test-plan.json` containing a mix of `automated` (unit/integration) and `manual` (exploratory) test cases.

## User Story: US-001 - Batch Automated Tests in a Single Agent Session

automatedTests.description: Execute all pending automated tests in a single batch.
Handle partial results from the agent (e.g., 5 sent, 3 returned).
Handle total agent failure (non-zero exit or invalid JSON).
Resume execution: Skip already passed automated tests.
Resume execution: Skip passed manual tests.
Verify progress JSON integrity after batch execution.
